skillTree.localised_description: This barded warhorse comes from the stable of the Knights Mariner, it's expertly trained in galloping up and down the harsh beaches of the Old World.

effects.description: Mount: "Floodstrider''

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The altar prominently features Manann, bearing his trident and five-tined crown.

effects.description: Mount: "War Altar of Manann"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The majestic beast called Voorwind is the Matriarch's personal envoy, it's a sight to behold to see it accelerate between the masts of incoming ships.

effects.description: Mount: "Voorwind''
Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Placeholder Text Placeholder Text

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Grand Trident of Manann"

skillTree.localised_description: "By the power of Manann I declare these warriors under the protection of spirital essence of the tides and waves!''

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Grand Shield of Manann"

skillTree.localised_description: Flooded by a jet stream of water, foes tremble yet followers of Manann bath in delight.

effects.description: Battle prayer: "Manann's Fury"

skillTree.localised_description: He who is touched by the sea may traverse the world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: When patrons of Manann traverse the seven seas they are protected by veil of oceanic essence, a deterrent for any lingering foe.

effects.description:
Armour: +15 when defending at sea
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The Cult of Manann is not as influential as their counterparts of the Cult of Sigmar, and Dauphine not as favoured by the emperor as Volkmar the Grim. Yet their importance is not to be underestimated, and their ambition even less so.

effects.description: Arranges a military alliance with Reikland
Diplomatic relations: -100 with Cult of Sigmar

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: A Cultist of Manann only finds true happiness when he’s out at sea, a bond deemed stronger than marriage.

skillTree.localised_description: The caster curses the enemy to feel as if they are standing upon the deck of a storm-tossed ship.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Sea Legs"

skillTree.localised_description: With the majority of land discovered the curious nature of men draws them to the secrets of the seabed, with all it’s riches and dangers lying in wait.

effects.description: Research rate: +10%

skillTree.localised_name: The Tyrants of the Black Ocean
skillTree.localised_description: Led by Dastan Coldeye, the legendary pirate who once famously challenged Lokhir Felheart, the Tyrants of the Black Ocean are a scourge for any ongoing vessel. Be it merchant or military.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: A renegade crew of former Barak Varr fleetmen know vow to sink any vessel daring to do trade with their kin under the mountains.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: Although it appears unnatural, these Greenskin pirates are hardened and skilled sailors having cut down even the most noteable of Empiric Admirals.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: The Freebooters of Port Royale are the only pirates who dare venture the taverns of civilized cities. It is said only due to Gentlemen Jenkins’s charms they are allowed entry. Their permanent absence would benefit all, however

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: A literal scourge for the Bretonnian coast, they Grey Point Scuttlers pass their tame preying on wandering merchants attempting to sail a long the wide stretched coast of the noble lands. Their demise would be a blessing to all afflicted.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: The Terrors of the Dark Straits are led by infamous Captain Sisicco, who is rumoured to believe he still counts himself amongst the living. Nicknamed the ‘’Flying Tilean’’ due to his exceptional nautical ambush capabilities, he is a scourge for wayfaring ships.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: The Churning Gulf Raiders are a vicious and particularly violent bunch. They’re methods are onorthodox and straight forward. Their impact on trade even more so.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: The Corsairs of the Spire are a ruthless band of mercenaries drawn to the unknown riches of the far East. They seek to unravel the secrets of the sunken city of Melay and unleash destruction on all that dare to step in their way.

effects.description: Triggers a Cult of Manann dilemma to either unleash Manann's Wrath or hunt a rogue pirate faction

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The Wave Lord has Manann's outmost blessing, bestowing upon him the very essence of the sea.

effects.description: Ability: "Bulwark of the Sea"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

effects.description: Embark on a quest to the far corners of the World, where the Cult of Manann must hunt the Red Chaos Whale
Limited Roster: The Cult relies on Marienburg reinforcements to unlock a full roster.
Hero capacity: +2 for Sea Magickers
Full Speed stance is upgraded to "Manann's Blessing" which increases campaign map navigation range at sea

items.colour_text: It is said the Matriach once wrestled a shark, only to drag it on land and display it as a trophy for those that dare challenge her. The banner carried by her personal retinue is a reminder of that impressive yet unconfirmed achievement. Regardless, it is a sight to be hold and renowned across the seas.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10
	(assigned unit)

Physical resistance: 25%
	(assigned unit)

items.colour_text: Brother Egbert Huibers is the Master of Novices of the Cult of Manann. In his late 40s, his intense grey eyes stare out from under salt-and-pepper eyebrows and a shaved head. A single gold loop hangs from his left ear. His weathered skin testifies to years spent at sea under a hot sun. Brother Egbert is devoted to Manaan and the sea. He brags that he knew how to swim before he could walk. He has a distinct distaste of what he calls "dry-landers''.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +25% for Cult of Manann units
	(all units in army)

Melee Attack: +8 for Cult of Manann units
	(all units in army)

items.colour_text: Odrall the Devout was renowned for his piety and a holy obsession with exploration. As High Priest of Manann he discovered large parts of the new world. During his travels he gained knowledge about the magical essense that lingers within the deeps. He became obsessed with the idea of obtaining Manann's blessing and was convinced the way to do so was to dive in to the deep and embrace Manann. He never resurfaced.

effects.description: Ability: "Odrall's Teaching''

Attribute: Unbreakable for Order of the Albatross units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
